title: Only My WeChat Group - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Xuanhuan
tags: Cheats   Cunning Protagonist   Modern Day   System Administrator   Weak to Strong
author: 梦幻后主
description:
Suddenly received a mysterious WeChat group that was given to him by his future self before death, Liu Yan learned about the future changes of the earth.

In order to survive, Liu Yan began to use this WeChat group to help himself.>
